div.p: Group 1 Mapping from Action Participant Typeversion: 5.0.0) to Action Participant Typeversion: 5.0.0)

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for ValueSet ValueSet-R5-action-participant-type-for-R4 from FHIR R5 to FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of concepts from ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/action-participant-type|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
